name: scheduleAdvisorMeeting
description: Check if the user is ready to meet with an advisor, help them prepare if not ready, and open a scheduling modal to select an advisor and schedule a meeting date/time. The meeting will be saved to the calendar.

properties.description: Preselected advisor ID (optional - user can change in modal)
Advisor specialization to filter by (e.g., 'funding', 'residence_permit', 'business_registration', 'tax', 'legal', 'marketing') - used to suggest relevant advisors if advisor_id not provided
Meeting topic or purpose (e.g., 'funding application', 'residence permit', 'business registration')

dynamic_variable_placeholders.advisor_id: The ID of the advisor to schedule a meeting with
dynamic_variable_placeholders.specialization: The specialization of the advisor to schedule a meeting with
dynamic_variable_placeholders.topic: The topic of the meeting to schedule
